name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GateScanner CDR Dome Download - Sasa Software

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securing web downloads with Content Disarm and Reconstruction (CDR) - for GateScanner Security Dome users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The secure downloads extension provides safe web downloading for authenticated users of the GateScanner Security Dome.
Dome users can connect the extension to their Dome account and automatically sanitize all web downloads, with advanced CDR anti-malware processing. 

CDR is a powerful anti-malware technology that disarms known and unknown malware that may be hidden in the files. It incorporates multiple AV tools, as well as applying a rigorous file deconstruction and reconstruction process, ultimately delivering new and safe copies of the original files, without sacrificing functionality or operational content.
